EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Coffee with Kelly - Billing Link to November 13 Recording The November 13 topic was: Batch Credits DATE: Every Second Tuesday of the Month TIME: 11:30 AM ET l 10:30 AM CT l 9:30 AM MT l 8:30 AM PT PRESENTER: Kelly Wachal - TriTech Supervisor of Customer Service and Education INVITE OTHER RESPOND SOFTWARE USERS: Forward this link: <http://offers.tritech.com/CwK-Billing_Registration.html>
See you next month! WEBINAR RECORDING RECORDING LINK <recordings.tritech.co/IA/Customer/CwK/Billing/11-13-12.wmv>
